pr.title: feat(subnav-ui): implement authenticated subnav globally and wire it to real saves counts + reminders consent toggle
pr.rollback: Revert PR (no DB changes in this PR).

receipt.goal: Implement authenticated subnav globally; wire Save Idea / product Save to user_saved_ideas / user_saved_products; wire reminders toggle to user_notification_prefs; Add a child → /app/children.
qa_steps: As guest: no subnav on / and /discover
Save Idea on /discover: category ideas saved increments; refresh persists
Product Save: toys saved increments; refresh persists
Toggle reminders ON/OFF: persists after refresh
